CustomObject.description:
To be used in validation rules and possibly other areas grant permissions on the opportunity object. Whenever a user or profile is assigned to to this setting and set to true. A validation rule can be used to check on if true or not. ex: $Setup.Opportunity_Custom_Permissions__c.Change_Ownership__c <> TRUE
This will make validation rule prevent anyone who is not assigned this setting.
CustomObject.label: Opportunity: Custom Permissions
